DOC.brief_title: Procarbazine Hydrochloride Capsule ( Natulan® ) Clinical Trial Protocol
DOC.detailed_description: This confirmatory open-label , randomize , control , multicenter study . Recruited subject randomize treatment group control group , ratio 1:1 . Treatment group accept baseline BEACOPP regimen , control group accept ABVD regimen . The study design consist screen phase 1 week , treatment phase 24 32 week , post treatment follow-up least 2 year .
